description.p: This event fires after all of the HTML for the Grid Part has been computed. It allows you to modify the HTML that was computed.

discussion.p: You can perform string manipulation operations on e.html to change the HTML that gets rendered.

description.p: You can also set state variables in this event. The value of any state variables will be available in all subsequent ajax callbacks (in the e.__si2 object).
